sentences.en: And so as a way of understanding what at this point is really the sheer repetitiveness of this disclaimer, I want to propose a metaphor.
sentences.cn: 因此为了理解这个论点是否真的,是这种放弃的纯粹的重复，我将会提出一个隐喻。

sentences.en: Auditor's opinions are classified into four categories: unqualified opinion, qualified opinion , adverse opinion, disclaimer opinion.
sentences.cn: 审计报告包括四种: 无保留意见的审计报告、有保留意见的审计报告 、 反对意见的审计报告 、 拒绝表示意见的审计报告.

sentences.en: Disclaimer - The information presented here should not be interpreted as medical advice.
sentences.cn: 免责 - 此资料不应被解释为医疗意见.

sentences.en: Disclaimer : All the statement of this post is consider as fictional.
sentences.cn: 免责条款︰此文章之所有内容应被视作虚构.

sentences.en: Disclaimer : We do our best to insure accuracy on our listings.
sentences.cn: Disclaimer: 我们尽我们的最好以确保我们的列表上的准确性.

sentences.en: Disclaimer for Trial Copies: you are not paying triallicense for your Trial Copy of the Program.
sentences.cn: 试用版不承诺: 你不需要为你的试用版程序付费.

sentences.en: Disclaimer: I own shares of Apple.
sentences.cn: 免责: 我自己股份苹果.

sentences.en: Disclaimer: This site is open for public access.
sentences.cn: 免责申明: 本网站对公众开放.

sentences.en: However, that method comes with a disclaimer: Do not use it unless you are sure of the result.
sentences.cn: 然而，那个方法却有一个放弃声明：不要使用它除非您能确定这个结果。

sentences.en: The company asserts in a disclaimer that it won't be held responsible for the accuracy of information.
sentences.cn: 该公司在一项免责声明里宣称它不会对信息的准确性负责。

sentences.en: The Disclaimer and Limitation of Liability of this User Agreement shall survive any such termination.
sentences.cn: 本用户协议中的免责和责任限制条款在本用户协议终止后仍然有效.

sentences.en: What will the report not cover? i . e. disclaimer.
sentences.cn: 这份报告应该不包括些什么? 例如: 反对(意见? )

words.tran_cn: 否认，拒绝；放弃，弃权；拒绝承认
不承诺，免责声明；放弃，拒绝

trans.tran_cn: 否认声明，放弃，放弃者，免责声明
trans.tran_en: a statement that you are not responsible for or involved with something, or that you do not know about it – used especially in advertising or legal agreements
